name: Users
columns: id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(15), fullname VARCHAR(55), password VARCHAR(15)

name: Posts
columns: id INT PRIMARY KEY, author_id INT, posted_time TIMESTAMP, text_content TEXT

name: Post_Images
columns: id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, url VARCHAR(100)

name: Post_Comments
columns: id INT PRIMARY KEY, post_id INT, author_id INT, posted_time TIMESTAMP, text_content TEXT
